verbs.description: [ARG1: i-225] [V: closed] [ARGM-LOC: between 6th and 17th avenues in aurora] [ARGM-PRP: for possible pipe bomb] police reopened interstate 225 between east sixth and 17th avenues in both directions late tuesday night after the adams county bomb squad determined a suspicious device was not a bomb the section of highway was closed for more than two hours starting about 9 p m aurora aurora colorado
